ingredients.content: 40 g bread, fresh or stale, cut into pieces
6 - 12 sprigs fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only
50 - 80 g brown onion, cut into halves

preparations.content: Place a small bowl onto mixing bowl lid, weigh in bread and milk. Set bowl aside and leave to soak.
Place parsley and garlic clove (optional) into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add beef mince, eggs, salt, and pepper. Squeeze milk out of bread and discard milk. Add bread into mixing bowl and mix <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer into a bowl. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Lightly grease Varoma dish and tray. With oiled hands, shape small meatballs (4 cm) and arrange them into Varoma dish and onto Varoma tray. Set Varoma aside.
Place garlic clove, onions and extra virgin olive oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>, then sauté <b>3 min/120°C/speed 1<b> <b>.<b>
Add crushed tomatoes, salt and pepper. Place Varoma into position and cook <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Serve meatballs hot with sauce.
